LilyAna Naturals was very quick to respond when I had a question about the order of applying this with my skin care regimen. Will order my next bottle soon!

I don't often write reviews, but had to share my love on this one. Get some!

customer_reviews.title: I can tell Vitamin C is included, the rest you will have to stay tuned
customer_reviews.text: There is no scent. And thats a good thing. I wouldnt say it is for sensitive skin, since it is vitamin c nor moistureizing. I have been putting on my face for a week now. So will check back and let you know how it works in a few weeks. Took pictures to keep eye on skin tone, etc. Stay tuned....today is dec 7 2k19
customer_reviews.author: readanlearn

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I was so excited to try this product as I have discoloration on my skin from battling acne for 7+ years. I read the instruction guide and followed the instructions carefully. I’ve been using this serum for a little over two weeks now and have noticed no difference whatsoever. I’m holding on to the hope that maybe it will start working, but it isn’t as good at fading stubborn discoloration as I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.text: The product was okay I bought based on reviews along with the face cream. This happened not too long after I bought it and I always make sure the bottle is sealed tightly. The paint is also coming off so it makes me wonder if it was also getting in the product. It didn’t seem to last long at all. I’ve bought other brands such a art naturals that lasted months and months but this was very short lived along with the face cream. I see it may work for others however I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Liquid gold!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stuff for about three weeks now and this stuff is AMAZINGGGG. I have combo, acne prone and sensitive skin...the worst combination. I was hesitant to use it because anything new breaks out my skin. Fortunately, this didn't and my skin LOVES it! I haven't had a single breakout (even during that time of the month, ladies!!) It really helped with some previous acne scares and evened out my skin tone. Friends and family have commented on how clear and fresh my skin looks. I will most definitely be purchasing this again. It would be incredible if they made a giant one for your whole body! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Zena Huam-Ko

customer_reviews.title: Did Absolutely Nothing on its Own
customer_reviews.text: Used it religiously and finished the bottle, but didn't notice a difference to my skin. This didn't do anything for me at all, but on the plus side it didn't make me breakout either. It wasn't until I started mixing in a few drops ofwith a few drops of the Vitamin C serum that I noticed a slight improvement/brightening to my skin. I would recommend the Physician's Formula elixir over this.
customer_reviews.author: CyndiT

customer_reviews.title: Great for healthier younger looking skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this first and then the retinol cream two times a day and my wrinkles have decreased by 60% or more and my skin looks great. I have sensitive skin and allergic to all kinds of products but I can use this product. I have used it for 4 months and am so happy. I can't wait to see what a year does. Bought it for my daughter because I wish I had started using it when I was younger. I'm over 70 and not hopeful that all the wrinkles will totally disappear but who knows with such a good result so far. Have patience and do it morning and night.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce T

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Had a Before and After
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a before or after and I'm sorry about that because this stuff really works. It takes time, but it should if it's good for your skin. At first I thought my age spot was getting darker. But then I realized, the faded edges were disappearing and that's why it looked darker. In fact, the fuzzy edge was gone. Now the center of the spot is getting lighter. Anyway, I'm very happy with this product, and I will be looking at the rest of their line. :-)
customer_reviews.author: suzb

customer_reviews.title: Love how this helps my face look fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in the refrigerator. After washing my face I go to the fridge, place a dropper full on my fingers, and pat this all over my face, including around and under my eyes. It feels very refreshing. After I do my other morning routine, I use toner, moisturizer and apply my makeup. I'm convinced that using this Vitamin C serum helps my skin look fresher and dewier. I even have this on subscription!
customer_reviews.author: Susanmarie

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Scent & Lasts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fade sunspots. I’ve been consistently using it but it did make my skin dry. It’s probably the hyaluronic acid that I may be sensitive to. I’m not saying it doesn’t work but I think I need more time. Overall, it last. I’ve got plenty’s left. I’ll review it again.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Most serums break me out, but this one does what it says. I've also started putting on the backs of my hands to see if it will help smooth them out. Thank you for your wonderful products!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy D

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, Not a DE Dupe
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a less expensive alternative to my wonderful, effective DE products. This is unlike any vitamin C serum I have ever had. The color is a milky white instead of the typical yellowish. That was a big giveaway right there. Perhaps there is vitamin C in it, but it must be in a very low percentage. This did nothing and I needed to go back to my DE. Sometimes you really do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: PJL

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really hesitant to purchase face products like this. I have sensitive, ance prone skin. I have been using this x2 daily for over a week and I love it! My skin is super soft and it hasn't caused any issues. I'm 26 and my skin went from oily to combo with really dry skin on my cheeks and forehead. This really helps with dry spots and wears well under moisturizer and make up! You do have to use a decent amount to cover face and neck but I will be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Its really working.. less than week results..
customer_reviews.text: Its working like miracle on my skin... i am already seeing results like my acne spots have reduced a lot , my skin looks and feels very soft , my skin is looking very nourished and happy.. i apply it in evening after washing my skin and once it dries out i apply LilyAna Naturals Retinol Cream Moisturizer and thats it.. next day morning my skin looks very rich and make up sets really nice... I only use once at night and next day morning i use Cetaphil Oil Control Moisturizer and Eucerin Oil Control Dry Touch Sun Gel ... its just wow.. something which is working very well on my skin.. no reaction no problems.. I am happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Priya Jadhav

customer_reviews.title: This Vitamin C serum is superior to other varieties!
customer_reviews.text: LilyAna Naturals Vitamin C serum is every bit as wonderful as all of their other products. I have extremely sensitive skin that tends to react badly to new products, even when they are introduced slowly. I never experienced this with any LilyAna product, including the eye cream, face cream, retinol cream (I began with every other night application for the first two weeks) and finally the Vitamin C serum. This serum goes on smoothly, absorbs quickly and never dries with a sticky feeling. For daytime use, when I follow it with eye cream and face cream and then use my primer before makeup, it never causes 'product roll up'. I highly recommend all LilyAna Naturals products!
customer_reviews.author: ThriftyMom

customer_reviews.title: Best Vitamin C Serum!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my third bottle of this amazing product! I had a facial and the esthetician said I should start using vitamin C to improve the quality of my skin. I was leery since I have sensitive skin and have periodic breakouts even though I am...cough cough...well out of the puberty years! I found this wonderful organic product on Amazon Day and have been thrilled with the results! I had only used it once when a coworker told me my skin looked different and better. I can tell you my skin LOVES this stuff so I can't wait to try more of their wonderful, high quality products!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi and Glenn Goodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Dried my skin out
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this serum because it was on sale. I had previously used an expensive vitamin c serum but decided to give this one a try because of the price. This serum is a lot different than my other product. This product is thick and a cloudy white color where as my other product is clear and an oil like consistency. After two days of using this product, my skin became extremely dry and flakey. I used it for a days more but the dryness got worse. I quit using this product and the dryness immediately went away. I wanted to love this product because of the price but unfortunately it did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Poor product, negative results
customer_reviews.text: Been using religiously since purchase one month ago, hoping to turn around skin breakout that began with use. Followed the positive reviews, that impressed me. Requesting refund, as advertised. Please simply credit my charge card or account. TY
customer_reviews.author: Judy C.

customer_reviews.title: The vitamin c serum is by far my favorite out of the three
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few products from this seller. The vitamin c serum is by far my favorite out of the three. I have been using it for a week or so and can see a slight different in the area under my eyes. It has a nice light smell, goes on really smooth and within a few seconds I can feel it tightening. I am going to use it until I am done and see about re-ordering. With there being so many different products out there I am not sure I see the results to merit the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rose

customer_reviews.title: I WASN'T SURE AT FIRST BUT I WAS WRONG
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this product at first but I have been using it for 2-3 weeks now and not even everyday, but I am beginning to notice a difference in my skin. The left over scars from pimples long gone have begun to fade and I've noticed a difference in my skin texture. I am going to continue to use it consistently. I wish that I had taken before photos but I will come back for an update in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Natnathi

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive and oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Softens skin, feels very soothing, smoothes lines, doesn't clog pores and does not irritate sensitive skin! Also doesn't make my already oily skin worse. No scent!! One bottle lasts about two months. It's a good value. I can't wear foundation because it breaks out my skin so I pretty much have to rely on good skincare products and a little bit of blush to make me look presentable. I'm on my 7th bottle!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivered obviously opened and nasty-looking
customer_reviews.text: See picture. The serum bottle was delivered with the lid unscrewed and the liquid all crusted on the outside of the bottle. Nasty and unprofessional on company's behalf for letting this get sent out.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: I see better, smoother skin!!
customer_reviews.text: My first LilyAna purchase was the retinol cream. I had been using that for about 1 week (and loved the results) when I decided to purchase the vitamin c serum. I absolutely love both of these products!! I can see a difference in how my pores look and how my skin behaves. I am inconsistent when it comes to skin care and I lose interest when I don’t see a results. I’ve been using my LilyAna products faithfully and I am so happy about my skin looking clear and smooth. The retinol cream and vitamin c serum are the absolute best products I’ve found!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I have used another vitamin C serum before but I like this one better because it has a thicker consistency. I have always had dark circles under my eyes for as long as I can remember. After using this for about a month I began to notice freckles under my eyes that I didn’t even know I had! My skin looks brighter and healthier, and my dry patch of skin on my jaw line has all but disappeared. I only use this every other day after I get out of the shower before bed. I will definitely be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: It's okay... I'll try something else next time.
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay. It wasn't clear but had a filmy consistency. I used it to see if it would work since the reviews are so good. It made my face feel a bit tight after use but once I put on my moisturizer afterwards, it was fine. I can't tell any major difference after using the entire bottle. The bottle didn't last me very long. I think I'll try a different C serum next go round.
customer_reviews.author: jgregory25

customer_reviews.title: Great serum at a  great price
customer_reviews.text: A dermatologist recommended that I start using Vitamin C Serums about 15 years ago. The one she recommended was over $100 per bottle. While my husband was working that was not a problem. I saw this product on Amazon at a great price and gave it a try. It works just as well as the expensive products. It also does not irritate my sensitive skin. I am 66, and my skin is better now than it was years ago. I use it on my neck and decolletage as well and have none of that crepy skin most women my age have. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for help with signs of aging (32yrs old) and overall skin texture. I have highly sensitive skin and this has not caused any negative reactions so far! First morning I woke up after trying this I noticed I looked hydrated and glowy. I’m totally optimistic that this will be a permanent addition to my skincare routine. Feels silky smooth going on, dries pretty quickly, no strange smell. I love the look of the bottle and it’s super important to me that everything I use is vegan/ cruelty free. Try this!!! I’m so glad I did!!!
customer_reviews.author: amy bolton

customer_reviews.title: REDNESS AND BUMPS GONE!
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea and small white bumps where I apply highlight and they’re GONE! My redness is almost completely gone and my face is super smooth. This was one of the reasons I wore foundation 24/7 but I haven’t been because my skin looks AMAZING! I only used it for a week and the difference is crazy! I wish I had some pictures to compare what my skin used to look like but I was so insecure so I never took pictures without foundation. I LOVE THIS. There isn’t a scent and it’s great if you have sensitive skin like me!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I'm lazy about skincare and this stuff rocks
customer_reviews.text: As I near a monumental birthday, I've been taking more interest in my skin and how it looks. I should have started 30 years ago, I know. But I was busy. I found this product on a blog and after reading the reviews, snatched it up! It's easy to use and coupled with the eye cream, it really "freshened" up my skin. Things look clearer and tauter. Very happy with this product and will keep using it!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Pdx

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne and wrinkle prevention
customer_reviews.text: I have pink, bumpy combination skin. I tried this serum because it boasts of color correction and to prevent against wrinkles (I'm in my late 20's). Although my skin tone hasn't change, my skin is so much smoother and supple. Honestly so surprised. All those small, hard bumps on my forehead have reduced and gone away. My skin feels tighter but not drier. I use this morning and night followed by First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Cream. I wash once daily with Philosophy Microdelivery Exfoliating Face Wash.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing! It’s become a must-have to my daily facial routine (and that’s not a lot lol)! I have sensitive skin and I still suffer from dreaded acne. Using this product helped clear my acne up and didn’t irritate my skin at all. There’s no fragrance or colors, it goes on super light and smooth, and it even helps with those fine lines! This is one product I tell people about because it’s that good!
customer_reviews.author: Emily McNeilly

customer_reviews.title: Comfort in a bottle🤗
customer_reviews.text: First , I love the old Pharma look of the labels ! I am an antique collector and these display well. Then the product (the most important part) does not disappoint. I have a rare illness and have to take some strong medications that cause my skin to be very sensitive. I had struggled trying to find something that wouldn't burn yet would actually cause improvement. This product did! I would not hesitate to purchase. You could pay more but why? This works without a bunch of toxic chemicals or perfumes💐 Just good honest ingredients! Great company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m in my late twenties have oily very sensitive skin with mild to moderate adult acne. I recently tried some products that were on the more affordable side from a popular name brand natural grocery known for its unique and low priced items. Anyway everything I used from there destroyed my sensitive skin. This in combination with a few other products I trust restore the clarity and tone of my skin in a couple of days. The pictures people post on here seem to be an accurate depiction of this products results. I was pleasantly surprised and feel it is worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: GaPeach

customer_reviews.title: Just try it!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write reviews, but the pictures speak for themselves. The photos show what using this serum twice a day (morning and night) did for me in a month. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ALS

customer_reviews.title: Instead of buying my 3rd bottle, I bought 4 more!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of buying my 3rd bottle, I bought 4 more! This serum is wonderful. I love the consistency and the way it is absorbed into my skin. My complexion is much more even after using this product. I wanted to wait before reviewing although I knew right away that it was working. In between my 2nd and 3rd bottles I tried another, cheaper, serum. No comparison! The bottles that this LilyAna serum come in are so cute! I have kept mine and am trying to figure out how to repurpose them.
customer_reviews.author: MrsLeyva

customer_reviews.title: Came for the packaging, stayed for the clean skin!
customer_reviews.text: There are no miracle serums but this is a really nice Vitamin C. I’ll be honest, I originally bought it because I like the packaging but I’ve been using this and the retinol cream every day (this in the morning, retinol at night) for about 8 months. The serum is light and not greasy. It absorbs quickly and feels clean on. I definitely feel like my skin looks brighter and cleaner overall than before. Wrinkles I saw starting seem to have been put on hold too. I like it! Company also has great customer service. Very responsive!!
customer_reviews.author: RabbiRochelle

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 75 years old..had dark circles and bags under my eyes. After using the serum for several week I’m amazed at the results. No more bags at all! I’m so glad I saw another satisfied customer talk about your product on a shopping forum. I use it twice a day and I’m completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bobs buddy

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic acid for face and eyes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Vitamin C serum. Can really tell a difference in the brightness of my skin when I use it. It is has a light gel like feel and goes on smoothly with only a very light scent. No stinging at all. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fabulous! I used it with my Amythest roller and my skin looked refreshed the next day. I’m looking forward to the assistance from the vitamin C with improving and eliminating dark spots and overall toning my skin. If you’ve never used products with Vitamin C and have dark spots and any discoloration that especially comes with age and sun exposure then you should hope on board cause it works so well. I can’t wait to try more products from this company. My next purchase will be their face cream.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Good serum, but oxidizes too quickly to use the whole bottle.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really great serum, and noticed improvement in 2 weeks. My cheekbones were smoother, and I looked like I was wearing highlighter. BUT, everyday I had to clean gunk off the lid and the last third of the bottle seemed to solidify. I stored it upside down, and tried shaking it onto my hand, using a chopstick to loosen it up, but nope. I have since switched to a serum that has an airtight pump dispenser and....no gunk.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: Vitamin C Serum for Face - Face Serum with Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin E, Anti Aging Serum, Reduces Age Spots and Sun Damage, Promotes Collagen and Elastin - 1oz
product_meta.description: Size:1 PackOur best-selling, high-potency Vitamin C Serum uses a concentrated blend of pure plant and therapeutic actives to help promote a supple, youthful complexion that radiates vitality. Formulated with antioxidant Vitamins C & E, as well as 5% Botanical Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C Serum is targeted skincare that addresses all the visible signs of aging including fine lines and wrinkles; loss of firmness and elasticity; and dark spots and hyper-pigmentation while promoting healthy collagen and elastin, and giving skin a dynamic, youthful glow. Use morning and night on clean skin as part of your daily regimen. Warning: for external use only; avoid direct contact with eyes. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place.
feature_bullets: ☑️ HIGH-POTENCY FORMULA. High-potency, prescription strength 20% Vitamin C serum to help visibly revitalize and boost dull, tired, lackluster skin, and encourage healthy collagen and skin elasticity. Refreshing and light, our serum helps quench dryness while delivering potent antioxidants for a radiant, glowing complexion.

☑️ MAXIMUM ANTI-AGING. Natural blend of proven anti-aging actives work together to refresh and rejuvenate while promoting an overall healthy, youthful skin. Formulated with Vitamin C & E; Aloe Leaf Juice, MSM, Wild Geranium, Horsetail, and Dandelion Extracts; as well as Jojoba Oil and 5% Botanical Hyaluronic Acid, which helps encourage moisture retention in the skin.

☑️ LIFT, BRIGHTEN, FIRM. Dark spots, hyper-pigmentation, scars, acne redness, and dull skin tone are no match for the revitalizing benefits of Vitamin C, and our formula is gentle enough for sensitive skin, yet powerful enough to deliver real, visible results.

☑️ BEAUTIFUL RESULTS. Water-based Vitamin C Serum applies light and cool to the skin, absorbs instantly, is non-comedogenic, and safe for all skin types including normal, oily, dry, and mature. ☑️ CLEAN. NATURAL. AND FREE OF. All-natural, vegan ingredients. Made in the USA with no artificial fragrances or colors, and free of gluten, parabens, phthalates, SLS, SLES, and petroleum. And we never have nor ever will test on animals.
